UpdateRoot.testTitle: Generation of RVSM Non-Approval alerts (RVSM system status validation)
UpdateRoot.testObjective:
This test checks that SKYRADAR generates RVSM Non-Approval alerts only when RVSM monitoring system status is OPERATIONAL.
Conditions for RVSM Non-Approval alert generation are:
1) The RVSM monitoring system status is equal to OPERATIONAL.
2) The track flight level is within RVSM airspace range (between RVSM_MIN_FL=290 and RVSM_MAX_FL=410).
3) The track RVSM approval status indicator is set to NOT_APPROVED or UNKNOWN.
4) The track altitude source quality indicator is equal to HIGH or MEDIUM.
5) The track is located within an RVSM designated airspace zone where monitoring is active.
6) The track flight plan indicates IFR operation.
7) The flag RVSM_EMERGENCY_EXCEPTION is set to false or the track squawk code is NOT emergency (7500/7600/7700).
- 1st step: RVSM system status is STANDBY, no RVSM alert should be generated.
- 2nd step: RVSM system status transitions to OPERATIONAL, RVSM alert should be generated.
- 3rd step: RVSM system status transitions to DEGRADED, no RVSM alert should be generated.
UpdateRoot.actionComment: Track is located in RVSM airspace at FL350 with RVSM approval NOT_APPROVED. RVSM monitoring system starts in STANDBY status.
UpdateRoot.actionDescription: Track meets all conditions for RVSM Non-Approval alert except system status is STANDBY. No alert should be generated.

TestResult.resultDescription: No RVSM alert is generated because RVSM system status is STANDBY (not OPERATIONAL).
TestResult.nextActionComment: RVSM monitoring system transitions to OPERATIONAL status at time 10. Track continues at FL350 with RVSM approval NOT_APPROVED.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: RVSM system becomes OPERATIONAL. This should trigger a RVSM Non-Approval alert.

TestResult.resultDescription: RVSM alert is generated because RVSM system status is OPERATIONAL and aircraft is NOT_APPROVED in RVSM airspace.
TestResult.nextActionComment: RVSM monitoring system transitions to DEGRADED status at time 17. Track continues at FL350.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: RVSM system becomes DEGRADED. RVSM alert should be cleared.

TestResult.resultDescription: No RVSM alert is generated because RVSM system status is DEGRADED (not OPERATIONAL).
